code:
flowchart LR
M[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] -->|start|Server(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
M[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] -->|start|Client(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

Server --> Listen{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
Client --> Dial{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
Listen -->|Accept|ServConn[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
Dial -->|Success|CliConn[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

ServConn -->|init|servInit[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
CliConn -->|init|clientInit[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

servInit -->|write|writeMapInfo[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
clientInit -->|read|readMapInfo[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

writeMapInfo -->|adapter| mapConn[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
readMapInfo -->|adapter| mapConn[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

mapConn -->|write|connWrite[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
mapConn -->|read|connRead[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
repo_description: the go mmap and share memory package
